actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to permit a two-watch system for certain officers and seamen on tugs and barges engaged in voyages of less than 1,800 miles.

summary.text: Permits a two-watch system for officers and seamen, other than coal passers, firemen, oilers, and water tenders, on tugs and barges, engated in voyages of less than one thousand eight hundred miles (presently six hundred miles).

titles.title: A bill to permit a two-watch system for certain officers and seamen on tugs and barges engaged in voyages of less than 1,800 miles.
